verbose_text: Although it is clear that two PTMs of Akt1 / PKBalpha, phosphorylation at Thr 308 and S nitrosylation at Cys 296, are critical for the regulation of Akt1 / PKBalpha activity under stress conditions, there are still many unanswered questions concerning how reversible phosphorylation / dephosphorylation and S-nitrosylation / denitrosylation modulate Akt1 / PKBalpha activity.
